mapper.sql: id, uid, title, post_time, contact_number, lost_time, lost_name, lost_class, address, article_state
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_found (id, uid, title, post_time, contact_number, lost_time, lost_name, lost_class, address, article_state, lost_describe) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lostTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lostClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lostDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

/*返回插入的成功的id*/
SELECT last_insert_id()
insert into tbl_found
uid,
title,
post_time,
contact_number,
lost_time,
lost_name,
lost_class,
address,
article_state,
lost_describe,
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lostTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lostClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{articleState,jdbcType=BIT},
#{lostDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_found set article_state = #{articleState} where id = #{id}

update tbl_found
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lost_time = #{lostTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lost_name = #{lostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lost_class = #{lostClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
article_state = #{articleState,jdbcType=BIT},
lost_describe = #{lostDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_found set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_time = #{lostTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_name = #{lostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_class = #{lostClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_state = #{articleState,jdbcType=BIT}, lost_describe = #{lostDescribe,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_found set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_time = #{lostTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_name = #{lostName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lost_class = #{lostClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_state = #{articleState,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
